integrationListDescription: This description has not yet been actually defined, please send help.
publishIntegrationModal: Are you sure you want to start the "{{name}}" integration?
unpublishIntegrationModal: Are you sure you want to stop the "{{name}}" integration?
deleteIntegrationModal: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" integration?
ConfirmRemoveTag: Are you sure you want to remove the {{name}} tag
ConfirmRemoveTagDetail: This change will be applied to all integrations.  Removing a tag will unassociate it across integrations and then delete it.  No integrations will be deleted.
AddTagDialogDescription: The following changes will be applied to all integrations.
EditTagDialogDescription: The following changes will be applied to all integrations.
ManageCiCdDescription: This description has not yet been actually defined, please send help.
ThatTagNameIsInUse: That tag name is already in use.
NoEnvironmentsAvailableInfo: No environments are available to tag this integration with.  Go to the CI/CD management page to create one or more environments.
MarkIntegrationForCiCd: Mark Integration for Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment
TagThisIntegrationForRelease: Tag this integration for release in one or more of the environments
ImportIntegrationInstructions: Drag and drop your integration files here, or click to select files using a file chooser dialog.
ImportIntegrationDescription: Choose one or more zip files that contain exported integrations that you want to import.
ImportHelpMessage: Note: The imported integration will be in the draft state.  If you previously imported and this environment has a draft version of the integration, then that draft is lost.
PublishingIntegrationMessage: Starting integration.  Your integration will start running in a few moments.
UnpublishingIntegrationMessage: Stopping integration.  It takes a few moments to stop the integration.
DeletingIntegrationMessage: Deleting integration.  It takes a few moments to delete the integration.

alerts.modified: A connection associated with this integration has been modified. To incorporate the changes, please edit the integration.
alerts.obsolete: The published integration has become obsolete and its recommended it should be republished.

editor.addStepDescription: You can continue adding steps and connections to your integration as well.
editor.confirmDeleteStepDialogBody: Are you sure you want to delete this step from the integration?

selectStep.title: Choose a connection
selectStep.startDescription: Click the connection that starts the integration. If the connection you need is not available, click Create Connection.
selectStep.finishDescription: Click the connection that completes the integration. If the connection you need is not available, click Create Connection
selectStep.middleDescription: A step specifies an operation on the data in the integration. Click one to add it.

choiceForm.conditionDescription: Provide a condition that you want to evaluate (e.g. ${in.header.type} == 'note' or ${in.body.title} contains 'Important').
choiceForm.useDefaultFlowDescription: Use this flow when no other condition matches

ruleForm.predicateDescription: Continue only if incoming data match
ruleForm.pathDescription: The data you want to evaluate

editSpecification.title: Provide API Definition
editSpecification.description: This description has not yet been actually defined, please send help.

reviewActions.description: This description has not yet been actually defined, please send help.
reviewActions.title: Review Actions

reviewOperations.title: Operations
reviewOperations.description: An integration can have multiple flows. Select an operation to start creating a flow.

selectMethod.description: Execute this integration when a client invokes an operation defined by this API.
selectMethod.dndInstructions: Drag 'n' drop a file here, or click to select a file using a file chooser dialog.
selectMethod.title: Start integration with an API call
selectMethod.urlNote: * Note: After uploading this document, Syndesis does not automatically obtain any updates to it.

ReplaceDraftModalMessage: Are you sure you want to to replace the current draft for the "{{name}}" integration?
ReplacedDraftMessage: Updating draft. Replacing the current draft of the integration.
publishDeploymentModal: Are you sure you want to start version "{{version}}" of integration "{{name}}"
ReplaceDraftFailedMessage: Failed to replace the current draft: {{error}}

steps.templater-instruct-text1: Drag and drop a file, paste in text, or start typing in the text editor below to add a template. If you already have a template file,
steps.templater-editor-placeholder: Drop a file, paste in text, or start typing
steps.templater-file-upload-dnd: Drag and drop your template file here
steps.templater-upload-invalid-file: '{{0}}' is not a valid file. Only text files can be uploaded.
steps.templater-url-upload-note: * Note: After uploading this template, {{shared.project.name}} does not automatically obtain any updates to it. You would have to edit the step and re-upload the template to incorporates the updates.
steps.templater-create-editor-title: Copy and paste a template or enter text that defines a template.

unsavedChangesMessage: Are you sure you want to exit editing the integration?

linter.linter-wrong-symbol-format: '{{0}}' does not conform to the format {{1}} at line: {{2}}, column: {{3}}
linter.linter-illegal-open-symbol: Illegal open symbol at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-too-many-open-symbols: Too many open symbols at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-illegal-close-symbol: Illegal close symbol at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-too-many-close-symbols: Too many close symbols at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-expected-open-symbol: Expected open symbol at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-expected-close-symbol: Expected close symbol at line: {{0}}, column: {{1}}
linter.linter-no-symbols: The editor contains no data-mappable symbols

integrationsEmptyState.createTip: Click to being creating an integration
integrationsEmptyState.info: There are currently no integrations. Click the button below to create one.
integrationsEmptyState.title: $t(shared:linkCreateIntegration)
